# NETWORK::NETWORK_SET_OVERRIDE_SPECTATOR_MODE

## Summary
Enables/disables

## Parameters
* **BOOL** override

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
By default, players cannot chat with players in the same team when spectating. This allows that to be overridden.
